snippet.title: KLOINKS! - gameplay of E1M3
snippet.description:
Note: this video was originally shared before the actual release of KLOINKS!, so some things might have changed. The description below this note contains some old information. For a link to the download and slightly more recent info, check out the release trailer-thing: https://youtu.be/1rGpxlfRCvc

KLOINKS! playlist: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLh4Lp52-UNccuI3p4zpsrvg47HKA1LQO4

KLOINKS! is a little total conversion for GZDoom I've been working on for the past two or so years. The visuals are all made up of 3D rendered clay-like material (that I made in Blender) and the music is also made by me. Sound effects are some old stock sound effects that I wrangled around a bit.
The first episode (9 maps) is already somewhat finished, it just needs a little bit of polishing before a release to the wider world out there.
Don't get too amped up though, you know how these indie passion projects usually go.

Please be gentle on the level design (and recorded gameplay), it's my first time doing both of them.
